description: Datasets can be used to bundle different sources and streams into a package that can be shared.

contents.name: DisplayName
contents.description: The display name of the dataset.

contents.name: Description
contents.description: A short discription about the dataset and its content.

contents.name: Category
contents.description: Indicates to what category this dataset belongs.

contents.name: CreatedOn
contents.description: The creation date of the dataset.

contents.name: CreatedBy
contents.description: The id of the user that created the dataset.

contents.name: Sources
contents.description: Contains all sources of the given dataset.
